name: Samuel D’souza
bio: Fluent in sarcasm, bad at replying on time. I love chai, good music, and overanalyzing movie endings. Currently on a mission to find the best biryani in town—wanna be my co-critic?

prompts.question: My go-to comfort food is…
prompts.answer: Biryani, because nothing else comes close.

prompts.question: A perfect weekend looks like…
prompts.answer: A long drive, good food, and a thriller movie to overanalyze later.

prompts.question: A fun fact about me…
prompts.answer: I once planned a weekend trip and actually followed through.

name: Noah Patel
bio: Adventure junkie, travel blogger, and dog dad. Always looking for the next mountain to climb or new cuisine to taste.

prompts.question: Craziest adventure?
prompts.answer: Hitchhiking across Southeast Asia for two months.

prompts.question: What’s on your bucket list?
prompts.answer: Climbing Mount Kilimanjaro and learning to skydive.

name: Olivia Brown
bio: Part-time barista, full-time creative. I love painting city skylines, exploring hidden cafes, and dreaming up stories I'll one day turn into novels.

prompts.question: What’s your comfort read?
prompts.answer: Any classic mystery novel—Agatha Christie is my go-to.

name: Purva Mehta
bio: Somewhere between ‘let’s go on an adventure’ and ‘let’s stay in and order food.’ Pro at making bad puns, average at cooking Maggi. Swipe right if you can beat me at useless trivia!

prompts.question: If I could time travel, I’d go to…
prompts.answer: The past, just to leave myself notes saying, “Don’t do that

prompts.question: My toxic trait is…
prompts.answer: Saying “I’ll sleep early” and then watching random history documentaries.

prompts.question: The best way to win me over is…
prompts.answer: Beat me at a quiz, or at least pretend to try.
